name: Gis maps
author: Frank G.

sections.description:
This plugin show maps created with qgis and exported with qgis2web, you just have to upload the folder with all map files to the server.

Upload maps:

  • You must have ftp access to your wordpress installation.
  • Upload all your qgis2web maps -each map in its own directory- through ftp or ssh to a directory named “gismaps_maps” within the wp-content directory.

Edit a post:

  • Use the Gis map tab to add your first map
  • Write the DIRECTORY NAME, make a test and copy the shortcode
  • Now you have a shortcode, you can paste it into any page or post editor
  • Save or publish the post

Note:

  • This plugin creates a sample map that connects with openstreetmap.org servers, you can delete this map at any time.
sections.installation:
• Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/gis-maps directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  • Copy or move the directory named “gismaps_maps” to /wp-content directory within your WordPress installation.
  • Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq: No frequently asked questions at this time.
sections.changelog:

  • Optimized images

0.2 (Oct 23, 2016)

  • Added text editor

0.1 (Oct 22, 2016)

  • Initial public release
